1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Utilities for token trees.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Tree
7  ( treesToTokens,
8    treesToTexts,
9    treeToText,
10    treesToDigits,
11    tokenClock,
12    treesToTime,
13    treeToFlatTerm,
14    treesToTerms,
15    treesToTerms1,
16    treesToInterp,
17    -- $Function
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type             as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message          as Msg
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Message  as Msg
25
26-- $Function
27--
28--  /Example/
29--
30--  >>> treesToTerms =<< B.tt "/a 'A3 /b 10"
31--  Right [("/a", [TreeL ...]),
32--         ("/b", [TreeL ...])]
33--
34
35
36-- ----------------------  Token
37
38treesToTokens :: S.TTreesToAb [S.Token]
39treesToTokens = mapM token where
40    token (B.TreeL t) = Right t
41    token _ = Msg.adlib "not token"
42
43
44-- ----------------------  Text
45
46treesToTexts :: Bool -> S.TTreesToAb [String]
47treesToTexts q = loop [] where
48    loop ss [] = Right $ reverse ss
49    loop ss (B.TreeL x : xs) = do s <- tokenToText q x
50                                  loop (s : ss) xs
51    loop _ _ = Msg.nothing
52
53treeToText :: Bool -> S.TTreeToAb String
54treeToText q (B.TreeL tok) = tokenToText q tok
55treeToText _ _ = Msg.nothing
56
57-- | Get quoted/unquoted text.
58tokenToText :: Bool -> S.Token -> B.Ab String
59tokenToText True  (S.TText _ q w) | q > S.TextRaw  = Right w
60tokenToText False (S.TTextRaw _ w)                 = Right w
61tokenToText _ _  =  Msg.nothing
62
63treesToDigits :: S.TTreesToAb String
64treesToDigits = concatDigits B.<=< treesToTexts False
65
66concatDigits :: [String] -> B.Ab String
67concatDigits = first where
68    first ((c : cs) : xs) | c `elem` "+-0123456789o" = loop [[c]] $ cs : xs
69    first _ = Msg.nothing
70
71    loop ss [] = Right $ concat $ reverse ss
72    loop ss (w : xs) | all (`elem` "0123456789.o") w = loop (w:ss) xs
73    loop _ _ = Msg.nothing
74
75
76-- ----------------------  Clock
77
78tokenClock :: S.Token -> B.Ab D.Clock
79tokenClock (S.TTextBar _ ('|' : w)) = textClock w
80tokenClock _ = Msg.nothing
81
82textClock :: String -> B.Ab D.Clock
83textClock = sign where
84    sign ('-' : cs)  = D.clockNeg `fmap` dayOrHour cs
85    sign ('+' : cs)  = dayOrHour cs
86    sign cs          = dayOrHour cs
87
88    dayOrHour cs     = case getInt cs of
89                         (h, ':'  : cs')  ->  minute 0 h cs'
90                         (d, "'|")        ->  Right $ D.ClockD $ toInteger d
91                         (h, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDh 0 h 0 0
92                         (d, '\'' : cs')  ->  hour (toInteger d) cs'
93                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
94
95    hour d cs        = case getInt cs of
96                         (h, ':' : cs')   ->  minute d h cs'
97                         (h, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDh d h 0 0
98                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
99
100    minute d h cs    = case getInt cs of
101                         (m, ':' : cs')   ->  second d h m cs'
102                         (m, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDhm d h m 0
103                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
104
105    second d h m cs  = case getInt cs of
106                         (s, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDhms d h m s
107                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
108
109    clock k d h m s
110        | m >= 60    = Msg.nothing
111        | s >= 60    = Msg.nothing
112        | otherwise  = let (d', h') = h `divMod` 24
113                       in Right $ k (d + toInteger d') $ D.secFromHms (h', m, s)
114
115getInt :: String -> (Int, String)
116getInt = loop 0 where
117    loop n ""     = (n, "")
118    loop n (c:cs) = case fromDigit c of
119                      Just x  -> loop (10 * n + x) cs
120                      Nothing -> (n, c:cs)
121
122fromDigit :: Char -> Maybe Int
123fromDigit '0'  =  Just 0
124fromDigit '1'  =  Just 1
125fromDigit '2'  =  Just 2
126fromDigit '3'  =  Just 3
127fromDigit '4'  =  Just 4
128fromDigit '5'  =  Just 5
129fromDigit '6'  =  Just 6
130fromDigit '7'  =  Just 7
131fromDigit '8'  =  Just 8
132fromDigit '9'  =  Just 9
133fromDigit _    =  Nothing
134
135
136-- ----------------------  Time
137
138treesToTime :: S.TTreesToAb D.Time
139treesToTime = concatTime B.<=< treesToTexts False
140
141concatTime :: [String] -> B.Ab D.Time
142concatTime = year where
143
144    year []             = Msg.nothing
145    year (cs : xs)      = case getInt cs of
146                            (y, '-'  : cs')  -> mwd (toInteger y) $ cs' : xs
147                            _                -> Msg.nothing
148
149    mwd _ []                      = Msg.nothing
150    mwd y (('#' : '#': cs) : xs)  = day (D.dateFromYdAb y) $ cs : xs
151    mwd y (('#' : cs) : xs)       = week y $ cs : xs
152    mwd y xs                      = month y xs
153
154    month _ []          = Msg.nothing
155    month y (cs : xs)   = case getInt cs of
156                            (m, '-'  : cs')  -> day (D.dateFromYmdAb y m) $ cs' : xs
157                            (m, "")          -> D.timeFromYmAb y m
158                            _                -> Msg.nothing
159
160    week _ []           = Msg.nothing
161    week y (cs : xs)    = case getInt cs of
162                            (w, '-'  : cs')  -> day (D.dateFromYwdAb y w) $ cs' : xs
163                            (w, "")          -> D.timeFromYwAb y w
164                            _                -> Msg.nothing
165
166    day _ []            = Msg.nothing
167    day date (cs : xs)  = case getInt cs of
168                            (d, "") | null xs    -> do d' <- date d
169                                                       Right $ D.TimeYmd d'
170                                    | otherwise  -> do d' <- date d
171                                                       hour (D.timeFromDczAb d') $ concat xs
172                            _                    -> Msg.nothing
173
174    hour k cs           = case getInt cs of
175                            (h, "")          -> k (D.clockFromDh 0 h) Nothing
176                            (h, ':' : cs')   -> minute k h cs'
177                            _                -> Msg.nothing
178
179    minute k h cs       = case getInt cs of
180                            (m, "")          -> k (D.clockFromDhm 0 h m) Nothing
181                            (m, ':' : cs')   -> second k h m cs'
182                            (m, cs')         -> zone1 k h m Nothing cs'
183
184    second k h m cs     = case getInt cs of
185                            (s, "")          -> k (D.clockFromDhms 0 h m s) Nothing
186                            (s, cs')         -> zone1 k h m (Just s) cs'
187
188    zone1 k h m s cs    = case cs of
189                            '+' : cs'        -> zone2 k h m s   1  cs'
190                            '-' : cs'        -> zone2 k h m s (-1) cs'
191                            "UTC"            -> zone4 k h m s 0 0
192                            _                -> Msg.nothing
193
194    zone2 k h m s pm cs = case getInt cs of
195                            (zh, ':' : cs')  -> zone3 k h m s (pm * zh) cs'
196                            _                -> Msg.nothing
197
198    zone3 k h m s zh cs = case getInt cs of
199                            (zm, "")         -> zone4 k h m s zh zm
200                            _                -> Msg.nothing
201
202    zone4 k h m s zh zm = let c = D.clockFromHms (h - zh) (m - zm) s
203                              z = D.secFromHms (zh, zm, 0)
204                          in k c $ Just z
205
206
207-- ----------------------  Term
208
209-- | Get flat term name from token tree.
210--   If the token tree contains nested term name, this function failed.
211treeToFlatTerm :: S.TTreeToAb S.TermName
212treeToFlatTerm (S.TermLeafName _ _ n)  = Right n
213treeToFlatTerm (B.TreeL t)             = Msg.reqFlatName t
214treeToFlatTerm _                       = Msg.reqTermName
215
216-- | Convert token trees into a list of named token trees.
217treesToTerms :: S.TTreesToAb [S.NamedTrees]
218treesToTerms = name where
219    name [] = Right []
220    name (x : xs) = do let (c, xs2) = cont xs
221                       n    <- treeToFlatTerm x
222                       xs2' <- name xs2
223                       Right $ (n, c) : xs2'
224
225    cont :: S.TTreesTo ([S.TTree], [S.TTree])
226    cont xs@(x : _) | isTermLeaf x  = ([], xs)
227    cont []                         = ([], [])
228    cont (x : xs)                   = B.consFst x $ cont xs
229
230    isTermLeaf (S.TermLeafName _ _ _) = True
231    isTermLeaf (S.TermLeafPath _ _)   = True
232    isTermLeaf _                      = False
233
234treesToTerms1 :: S.TTreesToAb [S.NamedTree]
235treesToTerms1 xs = do xs' <- treesToTerms xs
236                      Right $ B.mapSndTo S.ttreeGroup xs'
237
238
239-- ----------------------  Interp
240
241treesToInterp :: S.TTreesToAb D.Interp
242treesToInterp = Right . D.interp B.<=< mapM treeToInterpWord
243
244treeToInterpWord :: S.TTreeToAb D.InterpWord
245treeToInterpWord (B.TreeB _ _ _) = Msg.nothing
246treeToInterpWord (B.TreeL x) =
247    case x of
248      S.TText _ _ w    -> Right $ D.InterpText w
249      S.TTermN _ _ n   -> Right $ D.InterpTerm n
250      S.TTerm _ _ [n]  -> Right $ D.InterpTerm n
251      _                -> Msg.nothing
